department: Art of Africa and the Americas
description: Three panel huipil with round-cut neck opening; natural brown cotton ground cloth with supplementary weft patterning; sun-ray appliqué at neck with applied rosettes at shoulder; double-headed eagle pattern in dense red brocade with yellow and blue accents.
medium: Cotton, silk, wool; supplementary weft patterning, embroidery, appliqué
title: Woman's blouse (Huipil)
